name: Blooms - A Strange FPS
description:
Inspired by Metal Gear Solid VR Missions.

An old project I found on my computer. So I decided to upload it.

Controls: 

AWSD (movement)

Mouse (click on UI)

Left Click (melee behind enemies and shoot gun)

Right Click (aim gun)

E (look at weapon menu)

Q (look at item menu)

Escape (pause game/settings)
